src:
Sejumlah Wilayah di Jaktim dan Bekasi Alami Listrik Padam
02 Nov 2019, 20:22 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Sejumlah wilayah di Jakarta Timur dan Bekasi dilaporkan mengalami listrik padam. Listrik padam setelah hujan deras.
Salah seorang warga RW 09 Rawalumbu Bekasi, Zakky, mengatakan listrik padam sejak sekitar pukul 19.00 WIB. Aktivitas warga pun terganggu.
"Kayanya setengah atau seperempat jam habis hujan mati lampu," ujar Zakky saat dihubungi, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Hal yang sama juga dialami warga di RW 09 Rawalumbu. Namun saat ini listrik sudah kembali menyala.
Listrik padam juga terjadi di Jalan Raya Condet, Jakarta Timur. Sebagian warga tampak menyalakan lilin.
Selain itu, kondisi serupa terpantau di Jalan RayaBogor, Jakarta Timur dekat simpang PGC. Kondisi lalu lintas tampak macet dari arah Pancoran tampak macet parah.

(knv/hri)
text:
Some Areas in East Jakarta and Bekasi Have Electricity Off
02 Nov 2019, 20:22 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - A number of areas in East Jakarta and Bekasi are reported to have experienced power outages. Power outages after heavy rain.
One resident of RW 09 Rawalumbu Bekasi, Zakky, said the electricity had been cut since around 19:00 WIB. Residents' activities were disrupted.
"Looks like half or a quarter of an hour of rain the lights went out," Zakky said when contacted on Saturday (11/02/2019).
The same thing happened to residents in RW 09 Rawalumbu. But now the electricity is back on.
Power outages also occurred on Jalan Raya Condet, East Jakarta. Some residents seemed to light candles.
In addition, similar conditions were observed on Jalan Raya Bogor, East Jakarta near the PGC intersection. Traffic conditions appear to be jammed in the direction of Pancoran, which looks very bad.

(knv / hri)
